text: Grant Andrew Decouto (born 24 March, 1995), professionally known as Deko, is an American rapper and music producer. He is best known for producing OG Maco's "Want More" and Migos' single "One Time". He has also worked with Gucci Mane, K Camp, and, as part of the EDM trio Merge, OG Parker and Tee Romano. ==Certification== "Slippery" by Migos – certified gold by RIAA. == Production discography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ !Track !Year !Artist !Album !Producer(s) |- |Cat Piss | rowspan="3" |2018 |Ski Mask the Slump God |Stokeley |Merge! |- |Bipolar |Gucci Mane ft Quavo |Evil Genius |Deko, OG Parker, Smash David |- |Walk It, Talk It |Migos ft Drake |Culture II |Deko, OG Parker |- |Sensei | rowspan="2" |2017 |Chris Brown ft A1 |Heartbreak on a Full Moon |A1, Deko, OG Parker |- |Slippery |Migos ft Gucci Mane |Culture |Deko, OG Parker |- |1Hunnid ft Fetty Wap |2016 |K Camp | |OG Parker |- |One Time | rowspan="3" |2015 | rowspan="3" |Migos | |Deko |- |Commando |Young Rich Niggas 2 |Deko, OG Parker |- |Recognition |Yung Rich Nation |Deko |} ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Title ! scope="col"| Details ! scope="col"| Notes |- ! scope="row"| MoonKid | * Released: 22 February 2019 * Label: Warner Chappell * Format: Digital download | |- ! scope="row"| Iridescent | * Released: 12 July 2019 * Label: Warner Chappell * Format: Digital download | |- ! scope="row"| Moonkid Mondays, Vol. 1 | * Released: 2 March 2020 * Label: Deko * Format: Digital download | |- ! scope="row"| Crystalline | * Released: 2 March 2020 * Label: Yameii For President 2077 * Format: Digital download | |- ! scope="row"| Moonkid Mondays, Vol. 2 | * Released: 14 September 2020 * Label: Yameii For President 2077 * Format: Digital download | |} ==References== Category:American record producers Category:1995 births Category:Living people
